author: craigmcc
msg: Update build.xml and build.properties.sample to reflect the current
set of dependencies.  I tweaked Joe's patch to build.xml to remove the
redundant property settings -- the inherited values can be used directly.
Submitted by:	Joe Germuska <joe at germuska.com>
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: martinc
msg: Add try/catch around calls to Pool methods which may now throw exceptions.
This is really a "get it to build" change - the caught exceptions are not
dealt with in any particularly meaningful way.

author: craigmcc
msg: Tweak the build process for consistency:
- Include Apache License in META-INF directory of the JAR
- Avoid JavaDoc warnings by passing the classpath
- Source is packaged by itself, doesn't need to be in "dist" target

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix compile-time errors related to commons-logging caused by changes in the
logging packaging.  Along the way, defer logger configuration to the logging
package that is ultimately used by calling the standard factory method,
rather than trying to preconfigure a particular implementation.
